gogrep 'All(`foo`); Suggest(`bar`)' ./...
! stdout .
gogrep 'All(`go func() { $f($*a) }()`); Suggest(`go $f($*a)`)' ./...
! stdout .

cmp f.go f.go.golden
cmp baz/f.go baz/f.go.golden

-- go.mod --
module foo.test/bar

go 1.14

-- f.go --
package p

func foo() // TODO: convert to "bar"
func bar()
func f1() { foo() }
-- f.go.golden --
package p

func foo() // TODO: convert to "bar"
func bar()
func f1() { bar() }
-- baz/f.go --
// package p doc
package p

func fn(int)
func f2() {
	go func() {
		// comment
		fn(0)
	}()
}
-- baz/f.go.golden --
// package p doc
package p

func fn(int)
func f2() {

	// comment
	go fn(0)

}
